creator: rahul.bandgarhelp@gmail.com
text:
We are using FOP to print pages with proper format.
Some of documents get printed 2-3 sometimes 4 copies.

I think it is kind of bug? Need your opinion.

Thanks,
Rahul .

I cannot reproduce that problem. Am I assuming correctly that you're printing using the "-print" command-line option or using the org.apache.fop.render.print.PrintRenderer? Does it happen with different printer drivers? Did you make sure that the "number of copies" setting is set correctly in the Windows printer driver?
creator: jeremias@apache.org
jeremias@apache.org
text: Necessary info to reproduce the problem was not provided. Closing this issue.
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
